Articles.Content: I have already bought KSP through the official website, but is there any way I can get it on Steam without buying a second copy on Steam? And if there is a way, could you tell me how?

Click on "My Account" and then "Transfer Purchase". IIRC, this only works if you purchased the game before it was available on steam (~March 2013), so you're probably out of luck.
